assetProfile.address1: Harumi Island Triton Square Tower X
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nippon Information Development Co., Ltd. operates in embedded and control system solutions, financial and business system solutions, and other businesses in Japan and internationally. It offers mobile solutions, including Android and iOS native applications, and preinstalled applications; a range of technologies for home electronics and IoT, such as cloud-cooperation televisions and game machines; and cloud service solutions, such as Azure and AWS. The company also provides a range of embedded technologies comprising ECU development as vehicle infrastructure and automated driving systems of automobiles; medical system technologies for the production of therapeutic and diagnostic apparatus, as well as for the development of hospital information systems; social infrastructure, which centers on public wireless domains consisting of airports, trains, fire, and disaster prevention; various technologies for factory and plant control systems; and real-time OS, image processing, communication protocol, and various drivers and middleware systems. In addition, it offers contract and customer management systems for individual and group insurances; non-life insurance systems; mutual aid systems; credit systems development for the application, screening, approval, and crediting sales; and securities systems. Further, the company provides payroll and benefit systems for civil service; Web-based itinerary information validation systems; and logistics systems, as well as system construction and installation support, network server design/construction, server virtualization environment creation, and cloud migration support services. Additionally, it offers system/network operation maintenance; remote surveillance; IT system operational design improvement; and security operational management services, as well as provides business process outsourcing, data entry, and image entry services. The company was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
